Key Match Events: Ishan Kishan scored a 210-run knock in just 131 deliveries
Virat Kohli put on a show with his century (113)
Pre-Game Insights: Records suggest that hosts India are down for an upset against Bangladesh
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Bangla Tigers have an interesting record against India in One Day Internationals in the last one year, winning three of the four matches played between the two nations
Others: India's ODI Head to head record with Bangladesh is 31-8-1
The last time that India beat Bangladesh in ODIs was in December 2022
